name: Old Sale

details.first: ***This is a full stack website and authorizes admin, seller, and buyer for their different role.
details.second: *** Buyers can book their product the book seen in the dashboard.
details.third: ***A seller can add product and see added product in the dashboard.
details.fourth: ***Sellers also can add their product for advertising.

Using: React JS, React Router Dom, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Node JS, Express JS, Firebase,MongoDB, Vercel.

name: Lock Pc

details.first: *** This is a full stack website. Beautifully handled responsiveness.
details.second: *** Users can see some services and also can add service.
details.third: ***Each service has a details button to redirect the details page.
details.fourth: ***Users can add reviews for the services and see my reviews in the navbar but he/she has to be login first.
details.fifth: ***Users can delete and edit his/her reviews.

Using: React JS, React Router Dom, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Node JS, Express JS, Firebase,MongoDB, Vercel.

name: Code Fire

details.first: *** The Home page gives you the overview of the Website.
details.second: *** Each course card is dynamic so if you click a card, it will redirect you to details page.
details.third: ***Course details page has a premium access button for a private checkout page.
details.fourth: ***You can also download pdf of course details.
details.fifth: *** All the courses are taken from data server.

Using: React JS, React Router Dom, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Node JS, Express JS, Firebase,MongoDB.
